channel.title: Adding npcs on elysium
channel.description:
written by me for -fedexer-
go to your server folder located here [IMG]http://i8.tinypic.com/2hi110i.jpg[/img]
click on npcs folder
should see this
[IMG]http://i2.tinypic.com/49j8i35.jpg[/img]
thats were npc information is stored
run your server and open client etc and login
press f1 for mods or higher to go to edit page
click edit npcs
[IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/40l3z36.jpg[/img]
now click a free space
[IMG]http://i2.tinypic.com/4hvi2z8.jpg[/img]
should bring up a editor screen
[IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/1716/daniems1.png[/img]
edit your npc here // to place em
click map editor [IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/40l3z36.jpg[/img]
then click on map properties [img]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/1016/propertiesxh8.png[/img]
then click on npcs tab
[img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/7290/prposlb8.png[/img] set its spawn points and ur done
By Danie

item.description:
@danieb wrote:

written by me for -fedexer-

go to your server folder located here

click on npcs folder

should see this

49j8i35.jpg799×211

thats were npc information is stored

run your server and open client etc and login

press f1 for mods or higher to go to edit page

click edit npcs

now click a free space

should bring up a editor screen

edit your npc here
//
to place em

click map editor

then click on map properties

then click on npcs tab


set its spawn points and ur done

By Danie
